product_name: Snow Peak Cast Iron Duo Cookset
long_description: The Snow Peak Cast Iron Duo Cookset is a do-it-all cookset made with new ultra-thin casting technology that saves weight and increases cooking capacity without taking up more space. Cookset includes a pot, skillet, 2 plates, 2 lifter handles and a lid that fits both the pot and skillet. Snow Peak Cast Iron Duo Cookset includes a mesh carry bag for storage and transport.
short_description: The Snow Peak Cast Iron Duo Cookset is a do-it-all cookset made with new ultra-thin casting technology that saves weight and increases cooking capacity without taking up more space.
